snippet: Suze Orman, who offers guidance on personal finance through her books and CNBC show, is bringing out her own prepaid debit card, promising low fees and access to credit reports.
abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column notes Suze Orman, who offers guidance on personal finance through her books and CNBC show, is bringing out her own prepaid debit card, promising low fees and access to credit reports.
lead_paragraph: Suze Orman, who offers guidance on personal finance through her books and CNBC show, is bringing out her own prepaid debit card, promising low fees and access to credit reports.

headline.print_headline: TV Adviser On Money Offers Card
headline.seo: Suze Orman to Offer Her Own Prepaid Debit Card
